text.langsplit.title: LangSplit Options
text.langsplit.option.blendcolor.desc: Blends the original text color with the translation text color to help with the colored parts of tooltips.
text.langsplit.option.blendcolor.desc2: Like for instance the red enchantment curses. White text will always just straight up use the
text.langsplit.option.blendcolor.desc3: translation text color instead of blending.
text.langsplit.option.blendingratio.desc: Used for setting how much of the original color vs translation color is being used.
Lower for more of the original color and higher for more of the translation color.
